======Setleader for admin.======

= Description =

Command [[setleader.wiki|setleader]] or [[setleader.wiki|/setleader]] for admin to set player as lobby leader.

Enter one of these commands [[setleader.wiki|setleader]] or [[setleader.wiki|/setleader]] on server console / client developer console.

Note: [[setleader.wiki|/setleader]] command only available in Chat mode.
